Show / Hide Table of Contents

    Class Skin

    Stores attachments by slot index and attachment name.

    See SkeletonData DefaultSkin, Skeleton Skin, and Runtime skins in the Spine Runtimes Guide.

    Skin

    SetAttachment(Int32, String, Attachment)

    Adds an attachment to the skin for the specified slot index and name. If the name already exists for the slot, the previous value is replaced.

    Declaration
